scripts.prebuild: npm run clean && shx mkdir -p ./dist && shx cp ../locals.config.js ./handlebars.config.js && shx cp -r ../locals ./ && node ./js2json.js
scripts.build: npm run prebuild && node ./node_modules/hbs-cli/lib/index.js --data handlebars.config.json --partial ./src/partials/page.hbs --partial ./src/partials/list.hbs src/*.hbs --output ./dist/
